content.detailedDescription:
This was in 1993-1994, i was 13-14 years old at the time. i remember it like it was yesterday, it is very vivid. it is is the only thing i have ever experienced that i have no explanation for.

this took place in northern hillsborough county florida. it was about 9pm, it was dark and i took my dog out. i was standing in my yard on the north side of my house. north of my house is a field with powerlines and to the northeast of that, a lake. 

as i was standing there looking at the night sky towards the northwest. beyond the lake, i noticed a solid black object in the sky. it looked like a black silhouette against the night sky. my first thought was an aircraft then i noticed it had no lights. it was roughly .5 to 1 mil away from me, a rough guess. as i looked at it closer, it swooped down towards me at an impossible angle and speed. it stopped and hovered slightly to my northwest about 200-300 feet off the ground. it was not directly above me. it's nose was pointed to the east, with its tail to the west. it made no sound at all, completely silent. i stood there watching it while it hovered for what felt like 2-3 seconds, completely frozen.

after it hovered for 2-3 seconds it spun around and ascended to the northwest and was out of sight in the blink of an eye. again, at a speed and angle that no man-made aircraft can achieve. it defied physics. i ran inside frantic and panicked.

it was solid black, no lights and completely silent. it was shaped like an isosceles triangle. i would estimate its size at about 100 feet long and 50 feet wide.
content.summary: Silent, black triangle with no lights

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke with friend at 20:15 mntn time. while observing the eastern skies toward phoenix i asked my friend if the bright light over the san tan foothills was maybe saturn or jupiter. he said he didn't know. it was the largest and brightest object in the sky besides the moon. upon observing the object, it faded into darkness. at that time i told my friend to look and when he did we both observed the object re appear back to its original brightness and size. it was getting brighter and then dimmer many times. thought it was a plane heading toward us which would explain why it wasn't moving. then my wife came outside to see what the comotion was and she observed the object and was in "awe". she kept asking what in the world is that? we all observed the object get dim and fade into darkness just leaving a vague light barley visible to the eye. three planes flew by over the next 30 minutes but they seemed to be further off in the distance. the object did hover to its left then back to its right(slightly) and descended a bit then went back to its original position in the sky. on the outside of the object you could see a red glow but would always return to the white bright glowing light. we observed this light fade and reappear several times before eventually fading away into darkness. my friend did film it on his camera phone but the quality wasn't that good because it was off in the distance maybe a mile or two. this was the second sighting i had seen from my backyard. the first one i saw was ne direction over williamsfeild airport about two years earlier. light was smaller but faded in and out of view and moved in acute angels unlike anything i had ever seen. i observed that one alone so i didn't want to report it.  so happy this time my wife and buddy saw the same thing i saw!
content.summary: Large bright planet like object fadded into darkness then re appeared several times

content.detailedDescription: While watching a geminid meteor shower, i witnessed a square pitch black move across the sky rough 4 inches then vanish.  it was black against the orange light pollution reflecting back against cirrus clouds and easily visible until it completely vanished after moving for about 4 to 5 seconds.
content.summary: While watching a geminid meteor shower, i witnessed a square pitch black move across the sky rough 4 inches then vanish.  it was black against the orange light pollution reflecting back against cirrus clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Was coming home from christmas shopping. stopped at red lite. saw bright lite in front. thought was nightingale at accident. turned left. light came parallel. took another left light hovered in front. light was so bright had to put visor down. told wife " wouldn't it be cool if it was ufo? turned left again light followed turned right ,light followed. turned into driveway. when got out of car expecting to hear helo rotors. looked up as craft described above flew over. looked at wife and said **** that thing is longer than our street.  she said, doesn't make a sound either. then my daughter ,who was about7or 8 said dad it doesn't have any tail wings. it was a bright moon lit nite. we could see the shape very well. it appeared to be a gunmetal grey. had red lights front and rear of all 3 fuselages that stayed on steady. i guess the altitude to be about 1200 ft. it was traveling east at maybe 25 mph. told wife, let's follow it. we all got back in car. as i was backing out of driveway, told wife, i'll drive you tell me which way to go. as i backed out , had just put car in gear when wife said never mind it's gone. i asked where did it go? she said i don't know. when i blinked my eyes it was not there anymore. i did have a set of christmas lights in a tree that were setup to look like a flying saucer that was spinning. neighbors said it made them dizzy. can't win them all. that's my story. i'm divorced now ,but ex will still agree with what we saw. daughter still remembers also. remember telling wife (was working in naval shipyard at time) the center fuselage was larger then aircraft carrier that was working on. the center fuselage was about 1/3 larger and longer than the outer two. center fuselage was approx. 75-100 ft. dia. and close to 1/4 mile long. steet i lived on was close to 1/4 mile long. that's what i guaged it by. i remember telling wife, we could put every house on our street inside that center fuselage. i kept asking, how can something that big fly 25 mph and stay in the sky, much less making no sound at all. norfolk airport landing pattern is just west of my house. we could hear a plane landing in the background.As far as feelings we were all left in aaw. had no other whitnesses. all were inside or in bed.
content.summary: Flew directly over. 3 cylindrical fuselages with points f/r.Connected by short wings.

content.detailedDescription: Saw what looked like mars except that it was twinkling it went from stationary to move in very quickly to the north then slowly to the south then it disappeared
content.summary: Object that look like mars but twinkling moved north than south the dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second sighting in a week. i did not report the first one, but would like to report it now as it is significant.

 tonights sighting, march 2nd, 8:15 pm; i was driving north on highway 101 in a toyota pickup truck, periodically looking out my window for ufo's, as i had what i consider my first real sighting a week prior. during one of my quick glances i spotted a triangular craft with orange lights one each corner. it was very far up, maybe a couple miles, going very fast traveling south. it came in and went out of my sight within a few seconds. i yelled "there it is again!" and pulled the truck over as fast as i could, though i knew it would not be fast enough. the sighting was on a large straightaway in the mountains. there are no streetlight's, and there were no other vehicles, and the sky was clear, no clouds. 

the first sighting occurred on around the 25th of february. i was in the exact same area, going down the same straightaway. it was dark, approximately 7-8pm. i was driving a large old suburban truck, having a conversation, listening to my father in the passenger seat. i started to see something flying towards me. my brain registered hawk, which is something that you see flying here in the daytime. it was large, orange and seemingly floating in front of me, coming towards me. i was focused on driving and listening to the conversation, but also confused about what i was seeing floating towards me, when it finally closed the gap between us. i screamed out "whoah!" as a triangular craft flew over our truck and banked off into the only clouds in the sky. this all happened within ten seconds. when the craft banked, i clearly saw its outline. triangular, with flat corners, an orange light on each corner. it was a strange shadowy color on the bottom. when the craft first approached i'd say it was a couple hundred or more feet above the highway and to the left over a large valley. i think the craft was large, maybe a little smaller than a commercial jet. it flew very fast. i was extremely shaken up after the sighting while driving. i'm not sure how to describe the feeling, but it was almost overwhelming. 

the straightaway where these sighting takes place is on the west side of a mountain. looking to the west there is a large valley then more mountains. each sighting was in the same spot, the main difference being altitude.
content.summary: Triangular craft with orange lights darts across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work when i noticed what looked like a star.
this object was first viewed in the north westerly direction, from barrie ontario. with the naked eye it seemed like a star. after a while it seemed to change shape, almost elongated. 
the object wasn't too high in the sky at around 8pm when i noticed it, and slowly drifted down until it disappeared below the horizon around 9pm.
although i do believe in the possibility of alien life and craft in our skies, i am not quick to label this an alien ship. rather, something unknown to me that i would like explained.
content.summary: Looked like a star to a casual glance, then seemed to flash more than twinkle. shape didn't appear to be round, more like a grouping.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my kitchen, putting dishes in the sink. i glanced out my kitchen window and noticed a blinking red, green, and white light to the east. at first i believed it to be an airplane, until i realized it was hovering, stationary. it also looked a bit larger than typical plane/helicopter/etc. lights appear. when i tried to get a better look, i saw a second blinking light, almost identical to the first, moving east towards the first light, fairly slowly at first, and then it picked up speed. this was when i noticed the third light, same general shape/appearance and blinking the same pattern and colors, only with a lot more white, and this one was much smaller than the first two. i would say comparative to the size appearance of a star. this one was also hovering in place. once the second larger light made its way past the first hovering light, it seemed to disappear over the eastern horizon. then, suddenly, it shot back, moving higher than the other lights and making it's way back west much more quickly than it was moving before. the first large, hovering light then began to move west as well, seemingly following the second. it moved slowly and then picked up speed and altitude, until it caught up with the second large light and they both disappeared over the western horizon. the smaller light continued hovering for a moment, then also began to move west. it was much lower in altitude and moved much more slowly, until it also disappeared over the horizon. this all corresponded in about 10 minutes or less.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three lights, two larger one small.

content.detailedDescription:
Grafenwöhr (grafenwoehr) west germany summer of 1966

    grafenwöhr was a major training area for n.A.T.O. forces and 

located close to the czechoslovakian border.
    i was in the weapons platoon of a rifle company in the 

(u.S.) army. the weapons platoon was made up of 4 armored 

personnel carriers, which were 13 ton, lightly armored, tracked 

vehicles [m113]. three of the apc's were 81mm mortar gun crews, 

and the one i was in was the fire directions center. i was a 

driver at the time.
     we, approximately 14 men, were on a training mission out in 

the field by ourselves. the gun crews had set up their mortars 

and the fire directions center had laid in the guns, which is 

sighting them using aiming stakes for the gun crews to put their 

sights on.
     i was tired at dusk and rolled out my sleeping bag in a 

nice grassy area under a tree and beside my apc. another 

sargeant did also. i went to sleep quickly.
     three men, one on guard duty, were watching a star or light 

in the sky apparently pulsing with different colors. two of the 

men went on to their sleeping bags and the guard stayed up.
     my squad leader was on radio watch because we had been 

warned we might have aggressors trying to sneak up on us that 

night.
     the next morning, i awoke to find several men talking in a 

group about not being woke up for guard duty. just then my squad 

leader emerged from the apc and said he had fallen asleep at the 

radios for some strange reason. this had never happened to him 

before.
     my platoon sargeant, one of the three watching the light 

the previous night, told of being in a dream state and hearing 

the guard yelling frantically for help. the sargeant said he 

couldn't move but could hear.
     about 09:00 [am] we heard and saw the guard that was on 

first watch coming down a hill about 200 yards away. when he 

reached us he was hysterical and crying. he said, "i thought all 

of you were dead." he then recounted his story.
     when two of the three men watching the star the previous 

night went to bed, the guard went toward the woodline, where we 

had set up camp.The guard then turned toward a clearing to the 

west of camp and said a craft had landed there in front of him. 

it had numerous lights of changing colors all down it's side. 

the guard saw three figures emerge from the craft. the figures 

didn't walk on the ground, they seemed to be floating just above 

the ground and bobbed side to side. the guard yelled for them to 

halt. when they didn't stop, he thought about turning on his 

flashlight, but something in his head said 'no'. the guard 

grabbed an aiming stake and tossed it at them. [the guard was 

carrying a rifle but no live rounds were issued because they 

were not on a range at the time] he kept hearing a voice in his 

mind that said, "don't be afraid, we won't hurt you." 
     the guard heard one of the beings in the woods behind him 

and felt he was being trapped so he ran away. he came upon 

another group of gi's some distance away and told them his 

story. he pleaded with them to come to our position and they 

wouldn't. they assumed he was intoxicated on something.
     he stayed with them until morning then came back toward our 

position. looking down a hill he saw a silvery, cigar shaped 

craft still where it landed the night before. he ran back to the 

other gi's and again begged them to come with him. they again 

refused to come. he waited a few more hours and then came back 

to our camp when all of us saw him. he told us the story, and 

someone found the aiming stake he had thrown.
     the sargeant that slept a few yards from me said he had the 

strangest dream of being examined in a brightly lit operating 

room. he also said he had an awful headache in the top of his 

head. along with this, the grassy area where we slept appeared 

to have had a core sample taken from it. a round spot of grass 

and dirt a few inches deep were missing.
     the platoon sargeant recalled hearing the guard yelling 

desperately for help but he could not move.
     my apc had the infrared lenses cracked and everything 

electrical was burned out. i remember the maintenance crew in 

our company asking what happened. they had never seen this kind 

of damage to a vehicle before. my apc had to be towed in to base 

that night, later to be sent back to ordinance.
     the colonel, our battalion commander, wanted some 

explanation for all of the damages. when he was told, he said he 

could not file an official report, because only one person was a 

witness to the event.

     my personal experience of that night involved a watch i was 

given for graduation. it was anti-magnetic and glowed in the 

dark, but that night it stopped working and glowing.
     i knew the guard who was on duty that night, and after the 

incident he was very emotionally disturbed. he was sent away and 

i never saw him again.
     i don't have any recollections myself of that night but i 

really would like to know what that was.
     i am leaving the other mens' names out for their privacy.

        in 1966, i was in us army-a company-2nd battalion-21st 

infantry-24th division
content.summary: Three gi's watched light in sky one saw craft land with entities.

content.detailedDescription: Bright golden object, like egg shaped but longer, intense gold light. woke from nightmares only to have a smoke out my east facing window. looked up and seen this bright gold object moving over city, checked for iss on app on phone and was not in vicinity and then shone a laser at it, at that point it stopped dead in its tracks going due north and proceeded due east. then i heard jets, looked up and two fighter jets racing across the sky towards it. then a passenger jet after them. object kept moving until out of sight. no sound from object at all.
content.summary: Bright golden object, like egg shaped but longer, intense gold light. woke from nightmares only to have a smoke out my east facing window. looked up and then shone a laser at it, at that point stopped dead in its tracks going due north and proceeded east.

content.detailedDescription:
Monday evening march 2nd about 6:30 evening. tarpon pt. marina. cape coral, fl.

i had gone for a drive with my dogs to watch the boats coming in.  on my way out i got a call from a person having a problem so pulled off facing the water.
the sky was partly cloudy, but lower sky was clear.  i noticed what i assumed to be a star beginning to flicker across the water high above the tree line....This must be a couple  miles
 from my vantage point.  the star grew to a larger size globe like....Not moving.  i thought it could not be a plane since it was stationary.  then it began to pull down and split into two then three
other smaller lights, but all in a sort of grouping....Very hard to describe.  i was going to take a picture as soon as i was able to get off the phone, but then just suddenly it disappeared.  did not move any direction, but just vanished.  i was able to get a picture of the area only to give an idea of distance . i marked where the light appeared.
content.summary: See longer description.

content.detailedDescription: Looking up in the sky. i then saw what was like a star moving fairly quickly across the sky. it was like a large light. it moved right next to another big light then stopped. instantaneously the other big light moved the opposite direction than the first light.
content.summary: Like stars moving

content.detailedDescription: It was around 3pm (02-mar-2015) and i was at taking a break from work and saw something outside the window. i went close to the window and noticed there were 2 or 3 shining objects flying/hovering in the sky. it looked like an airplane at first, coming from far (from north-east) as it was way up in the sky, under the clouds (dark clouds as it was about to rain). but i realized it wasn't a flight or a bird as it was hovering up/down, side-to-side and in-out of the clouds. i called a friend to see it and then i took a video of it, but only managed to get one of the object in the frame as it was very faint and far.
content.summary: Shiny objects coming in and out of storm clouds

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were leaving the store (name and address removed) and noticed the brilliant sunset. i asked him to take a couple of photos, as his phone is better than mine and we returned home. at reviewing the photos, i noticed that in the first photo there were strange orb like lights right below the cloud cover. i didn't remember seeing the orbs while photographing the scene. the second picture, was zoomed in to get the man made objects out of the picture. in that photo, the orbs were no longer there. that photo was taken 9 seconds later. the area the orbs were in was also included in the second picture but none to be seen. after observing the photo more closely, it does appear that maybe there is something other than just the orbs. it sort of looks like maybe a cloaking of the actual craft. i'm no expert, so i can't be sure.
i have witnessed before, many years ago, and  it was a singular orb-red in color. i am not surprised of the existence but, i am that i didn't even notice them being there. it makes me feel unsure of what my eyes see and that something can be that close and i nor he realize it.
content.summary: The orbs were not observed until the photo was viewed later. the picture was taken to capture the sunset.

content.detailedDescription: Jackhead manitoba ufo shot down and crashed reports army closed off area but was just a training exercises which is a lie when does the army do these things such as the reports of evacuation of residence, detained witnesses and a media/communication black out witnesses being threatened and most if not all by now facebook posts by witnesses of video and pictures  are beeing erased nothing from anyone since feb 28th, 2015   months and days leading to the crash ufos have been witnessed in and around melfort,saskatchewan canada and winnipeg ,manitoba canada with a military presence
content.summary: Jackhead manitoba ufo shot down and crashed

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i walking to the car noticed a very bright splinter light hovering we observed it for about 20 minutes it did not move after 10 minutes a faint blue haze light came out the right side of it that curved down to the ground eventually disappeared.It was not a planet or planes i felt as if it was aware that we were observing it a very strange and frightening experience.
content.summary: Walking to car friend's noticed very bright splinter light hovering also noticed blue haze of light to the right for 3seconds curved out and down .It was not a planet or planes.

content.detailedDescription:
the event happened when i was three years old, back in 1983. my parents were looking into buying a new house and we were out driving with the real estate agent to the new prospective house. it was late in the cold, march or april day. the details i cannot quite remember. but i know it was dark, and seemed kind of late to me at the time.
     we were driving west and to the right of us was an open field, with a line of hospital buildings spotting the terrain. my father was driving, the real estate agent was in the front, and my mother, brother(three years my elder), and myself were all in the backseat.
     my brother and i were both looking out of the back window, upside down-like. and that's when we both spotted the three objects that were approaching the field and descending. we quickly got our mothers attention, and she looked out and saw as well. i remember her saying, "what the hell is that?!" and that's when the real estate agent looked out to his surprise and saw the same anomaly. 
     there were three objects, now hovering. as i remember they were three different shapes (although my brother only remembers seeing one).
i remember seeing a triangle, a rectangle, and a circle. all of them had lights (i don't remember colors), and the strangest thing that i recall was that they were all moving in a flipping motion.
     they came within a few hundred feet above the tree lines, and the only one that didn't get a chance to see them was my father. by the time he pulled the car over (which my mother demanded he did so he can see it), the objects flew away straight up into the sky and out of sight faster than anything i've ever seen. the real estate agent's face was pure white and he said, "i've never seen anything like that before..."
     i was very young, but in shock. i could not sleep that night, and that memory will always be with me. i just want some validity to it. i just want to know that what i saw was real. 
     this did happen very close to o'hare airport (about 2-3 miles). but i'm sure what we saw didn't move in any form of physics that we have ever seen. and here i am, 32 years later. and i still recall. we still recall.
content.summary: 3 different shapes; flipping motion; ascended and gone in a couple of seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling in the rear of a vehicle on the m6 motorway in the lancashire are, possibly north of preston uk, with 2 friends in the front. we had been camping and were returning home. i can't remember  the exact date but i can remember it was june 1995 and the time was around 2am.
i happened to look out the rear window and immediately noticed a large black triangle in the sky, with three reddish lights one on each corner. it was difficult to tell in a moving vehicle, and in the dark, exactly how far away the object was and whether it was moving or stationary, but it was definitely there and very distinct. 
i said to my friend who was in the front passenger to look at it, which he turned himself around in the seat and did and he witnessed the object too.
we both continued to watch out the rear window, the object being at about a 45 degree angle, for several minutes, at first the object seem to stay at the same pace as the car, but after these few minutes it began to fade in the distance as we were moving on the motorway, this made me realise that at some point it must have became stationary. it faded further to the point were it had almost vanished, i could just about make out the lights, when unbelievably the friend who was driving the car said "is that what your looking at" and pointed up out of his front window, again about a 45 degree angle, and there it was a huge triangle, around several 100 feet above the car, but again difficult to tell exact height. however what was evident to me immediately was i had just watched the object disappear in the rear distance, only for it to appear in front of the car literally in the blink of an eye. this completely amazed me.
this observation to the front of the car, the triangle was extremely clearly silhouetted even more as the light in the night sky had changed looking out the front window as opposed to the rear. the sighting was also now confirmed by a 3rd witness. the driver had not been able to see the object when it was behind the car for obvious reasons, but he could now see it too.
the object again seemed stationary as almost straight after seeing it again it moved back to the rear window, i.E. we seemed to be travelling under it. and again the object faded into the rear distance over a period of several minutes, when amazingly the exact same thing happened again, the triangle appeared in front of the car in seconds. we were all completely transfixed by what was happening.
this 2nd time, the object seemed to move forward with the car for around 5 minutes, 45 degrees out the front window to the right hand side. 
it's next movement amazed us further, it moved extremely quickly forward, turning to the left with a long bending movement, and started to descend, travelling across our path, i.E from the right hand side across the motorway onto our left, and after about 30 seconds it had moved about 90 degrees to the left hand side of the vehicle and still very visible and still moving, when it eventually disappeared behind a tree line.
we did not see the object again.
some points:
-the whole event last around 15-20 minutes.
-for brief moments the outline of the triangle would disappear, particularly when the viewing angle was lower and it seemed to descend at the end of the event, however, it was always clearly visible by the lights on each corner, they were constantly visible, sometimes bright and sometimes faded, but constantly visible.
-the 1st occasion the object moved to the front of the car i saw it for at least one or two full minutes very very clearly, whatever it was it was very large, very dark with a clear definitive triangle outline, had a reddish light on each corner. very very clear sighting.
-i have been fascinated by these triangles ever since, and ufos in general, and have wondered for 20 years whether what i actually saw was an extraterrestrial object, or a government project of some kind that the public are unaware of, whatever it was it was definitely real and i will never forget it!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large black triangle in sky above car on motorway for 20mins

content.detailedDescription:
On 01/17/14 at approximately 16:00hrs while driving in the vicinity of washington avenue and garden street in titusville, brevard county, florida (coordinate 28.616444n  80.804463w) i witnessed  "angel hair" falling from the sky.  the "ah" was in strings varying in length from a few inches to several feet and  numerous enough that it could be seen on the ground.  

pulling to the side of the road i got and looked around but did not see a ufo or other anomaly then  collected several strands of  "ah" on a shirt (see photo ) and saw more stuck to my vehicle.  the fibers were sticky and matted together when touched.  upon arriving home i photographed the "ah" and put a sample in a plastic freezer bag which disappeared , possibly sublimating.

angel hair has long been associated with ufo sightings and manifestations of the virgin mary.  it is also well established that spiders of the family linyphiidae  migrate on the wind by riding long strands of web(ballooning).  a variety of linyphiidae known as the "florinda black tailed red sheetweaver" does reside in florida but i have been unable to determine if the florida variety migrates on the wind or if they reside in the brevard county area of east central florida.  

mufon cms data lists 2 sighting reports from this area (titusville and satellite beach) on the date of this sighting(01/17/2014).

historical weather data (noaa at space center executive airport ktix) on 01/17/2014 was reported as; temperature  33--62 f, dew point 30 f,  humidity 26--87%, sea level pressure 30.17", winds 5-9mph wsw, visibility 7 miles. 

the photo file exif data time stamp is not correct, subtract one hour.  the photo has been cropped, balanced for color, contrast  and exposure.

one year later, 01/25/2015, i had a sighting of 3 silver orbs in association with angel hair.  please reference my mufon report #62888.
content.summary: Angel hair, 01/17/2014.  supplemental information to my report #62888

content.detailedDescription:
Delivering pizza on canaveral groves blvd heading west , dusk pink sky no clouds at all!  i grew up in a military air force family .  ive been to many airshows.  the object i saw was spherical , reflected pink sky off of it.  watched it for 5-6 seconds it was about 20,000-30,000 altitude in front but miles away at least 4 or more!  it seemed as if it was trying to get my attention, the area in the sky it was i to catch my eye to look at it, and im the only one who saw it probably so i feel it was trying to get my attention on purpose!
i looked down for one second then back and it disappeared, impossible!!
i searched rest of ride to house on date palm drive, gave them their pizza, i delivered pizza for ten years as a second job.   turned around and looked and studied the huge empty sky looking for anything and sign, then i noticed something, a commercial jet liner entering its airspace, i judged sizes ufo was two times size of jetliner!!!
two times the size!!!  woah, huge as hell!!! and to just hover and sit up there!
i feel this is how flight on way to australia disappeared a few months ago!!  my heart tells me so!!  
my mufon report on this was deleted so im posting it again!!
a month after reprting this in 05' the show " invasion" came on tv!  watch it and learn asap
please!!!
ive been waiting my whole life for this moment and i got it!
i couldnt be happier, maybe next teport ill talk about telepathic contact before sleep one night when something actually made contact, err my foot hit something that told me to swing my door further waiting to fall asleep!  awesome
content.summary: It  cloaked

content.detailedDescription:
A friend from the recent open minds ufo congress and myself were on groom lake road 7-1/2 miles south of the extra terrestrial highway 25 miles east of rachel nevada.
7
we had turned around at the entrance to nellis and being in the lead car stopped, turned off my lights and used my iphone dark sky meter app to take a reading of the darkness of the sky. my friend pointed north and said look at that! 

we were both transfixed as we saw a glowing red round or spherical object with red fire shooting out of the back and sparks as if it were charged particles ignited by plasma. the unconventional flying object was as slow as an airliner in its final approach and seemed to be on a trajectory to the nellis base. 

neither of used our phones or grabbed a camera to photograph the object as we couldn't take our eyes off it.

i estimate it was 15 degrees above the horizon and close within 5 miles maybe closer. it came in from the north and headed southwest. they sky had intermittent clouds. we may have spent 1 minute or more watching the object.

it appeared to turn south south east and we lost it in cloud cover actually we both stopped watching it and did not really lose sight of it.

there was no lost time recorded.

no feelings of anxiety or fear accompanied the sighting.
i can provide a sketch and map later.
content.summary: In dark skies off the extra terrestrial highway saw in the north a round glowing object with a tail of red fire that seemed to be plasma with charged particles

content.detailedDescription: I took a picture of the sun one day. later, after looking at the picture on my tablet and zooming in, i discovered the orb below the sun. i was standing in my driveway at the time the picture was taken. it so happens that the orb appears to be in the same spot in the sky as a ufo that has repeatedly shown up at night.
content.summary: Orb discovered in photo below sun.

content.detailedDescription: I discovered this rectangular, box-like ufo in a photo that i took of the sun setting one day outside my house. i was not trying to capture a photograph of a ufo. i thought the sunset was quite beautiful and i wanted to get a picture of it. so i took the picture on my tablet. later, while zooming in on the sun in the distance, i discovered the mysterious object. i did not notice it at the time of taking the picture in my driveway.
content.summary: Box-like ufo discovered in photo during broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription: i experienced a childhood alien abduction. (i am 37 years old now.) it's not something that i have wished to talk about, just because of the stigma attached to it. but something began happening recently that has forced me to confront the uncomfortable reality. let me back up a bit. shortly after my childhood abduction, i noticed a mysterious, oval-shaped mark on my lower left leg, right above my ankle. it is purple and the outer edges look very much like a laser burn. i didn't really make a connection between the mark and my abduction at the time. i just figured that it would eventually go away. but here i am, more than twenty years later, and not only has it not gone away, but it has never even faded with the passage of time. it is as fresh today as it was when it first appeared all those years ago. it is located on a part of my leg that is not easy for me to look at. however, recently i began taking close-up photographs of the mark and really looking at it. i was not prepared for what i discovered. i saw very distinct alien faces in the center of this inexplicable mark. they are not the stereotypical alien images. and they are somehow changing. in fact, to date, a new face appears just about every day. there is a white material inside the oval-shaped mark and it is this white film that is somehow morphing into these different alien "portraits". i have even captured video of the process taking place, in between the transition of faces. since i have decided to go public with my story, ufos have been appearing outside my house on an almost nightly basis. of course, in addition to the photos, i still have the physical mark on my leg for anyone to see in person who wishes to do so. i am sending you the photos for you to review and analyze. i am open to any and every kind of expert examination in order to verify that this is a real phenomenon. thank you for your time and god bless.
content.summary: Alien faces are appearing on my skin.

content.detailedDescription: I was working at new cross train staion in london at about 6 o'clock laying concrete blocks when i looked up and noticed a star like object in the sky  what grabbed my attention was that it looked so big and it was pulsating but not changing colours it seemed to be in the line of flight paths and i saw a lot of planes go past it a couple of times it moved then came back to its original position i also saw 2 helicopters head towards it one seemed to pay attention but the other went by one of the helicopters seemed to be all black which made me think this is very strange as the black helicopter approach ed  it dissapared for about 5 mins then came back i also alerted work pals who also observed this object i would like to say that i have never done this before and am 100 percent sure it was not a civilian aircraft thanks for taking time to read this
content.summary: Starlike object spotted over london

content.detailedDescription: A little after 10:00 pm i went outside to test my sony camcorder and observed a triangle shaped object moving in a westward direction at a good rate of speed, the sighting lasted about three minutes. the object was emitting a strange pulsating hum like a transformer, the object headed off to the west and i shot video for as long as it was visible. the object stayed on a steady course as it flew in a direct path to the west. i have taped unusual phenomena in the past and have submitted previous ufo footage to mufon so i was i a stable emotional state as i videoed this object, my strongest emotion was curiosity.
content.summary: Saw a triangle shaped craft maneuvering towards the west

content.detailedDescription:
Please excuse my spelling and punctuation, not my strong point. 
1994 -1995 lightening ridge australia. my self and 4 friends arrived back to my camp / caravan on the out skirts of town, at just past 3pm in the afternoon.

on one side of my caravan was plastic bbq chairs we where all sitting on. to one end of my caravan was a large gum tree. i lent back in my chair and looked up and hovering directly above the gum tree was a craft. the surface is very hard to explain. but shimmered a variation of colors primary reds, orange, yellows over a solid surface that looked like machined cast iron aka (not real shinny) like alloy or steel. best way to describe it was like paint swirling on the top of water.
the surface then began to change the best description i can give is the surface of the object started to protrude. closest thing i can put it to is when you see and object dropped in a bucket of water in slow motion, the way it peaks. the whole surface did the same thing and the shards got longer and changed color to a ghostly white until it consumed me. everything even my peripheral vision. i was just enveloped in the light its self.The light its self characteristics where like looking up at a waters surface from underneath the water. the way the light refracts, only white. i remember being conscious of standing with my toes pointing down. witch should not have been the case as i was sitting in my chair like the other 4 people with me. 
after what felt like around 30s to 1 minute i was sitting in my chair with my arms crossed on my lap to one side looking at the ground. as i lifted my head i noticed all the others where sitting in the same position and starting to look up at each other. 
truth is i thought i had some heat head spin or something like that and was not going to say anything. then steven 1 of the 4 who was sitting just across from me said. "call me crazy but did any of you just see that" we all jumped to our feet saying "hell yes it was just" .... we paused because the object was still above us back to its original shape and color. after a few "f&ck me" expressed by us all it started to move away. there was a clearing from the back of my caravan of around 100 meters to the tree line. we literally brisk walked next to it as it moved away towards the treeline without a sound. i could have thrown a rock at it, it was that close. as it passed over the tree line arron said lets get torches and follow it see if it lands. i remember arron and i exchanging a quick look of recognition as it was almost dark around 5:15 pm non daylight savings time. we all ran back to arron's house to find torches and told his mother and also shaun's parents who's house backed on to arron's naturally they called us crazy. we spent the next few hours trading descriptions of what happened and all seemed to match my own. it was spotted around 350 km away that night in a town called dubbo. witch made it to the local paper. 
now the odd thing to this day that bothers me... the light that surrounded me / us. and what happened to the time. i know 100% the craft exists but i can not say i or we saw aliens. i left lightening ridge not long after and lost contact with the lads i was with. over the years i have had endless dreams of being on craft, dreams of alien faces a few inches above me. i wake regularly out of a deep sleep to such an uneasy feeling that i get up and check on my kids and look in every room. i have watched almost every video over the years on hundreds of social media in the hope to see or hear something that looks or sounds close to what we saw. and with the exception of maybe 5 i have read or viewed i never have. people who post picks or video of dots of light. are just that dots of light and nothing more. im still waiting for that one photo or video that i can say that is the real deal. their is one incident that i saw that im not ready to debunk. a laddie over in the stated while at a busy intersection claims to have see an object and it let off a odd light. and the guy who hosted the show tried to debunk her by saying to many people where around and someone else would have seen something. the light i / we saw consumed you and held you captivated by it completely. imo it could happen to 1000s at once and you would never know. 
arron still lives in lightening ridge as i found a post in the paper from their in 2014. sean invest, steven and arrons older brother lee im not sure of his whereabouts. 
i have recently gone to a physiologist and told him the story but he can't help as it was the first time anyone has ever told him anything like it. so at current time im left with unanswered questions that i may never get answered. all i can say is it changed my life and continues too till this day. i will take a polygraph test what ever it takes just to get answers. thanks and i hope this helps in some way shape or form. feel free to ring or email me with any other questions.
content.summary: My self and 4 friends saw the real deal up close.

content.detailedDescription: I was vacationing with my girlfriend in mazatlán, mexico feb 20-27 2015. every night after the entertainment was finished i would go up our room and sit on the 7th floor balcony and look to see how many fishing boats were out and star gaze; specifically the moon which crescents are located differently as the moon would appear in canada. i could only see 35 degrees to my left (south) as the hotel blocked my view. on feb 21 or slight possibility the 22/2015 at approximately 1130 pm  red-white circler lights started to appear from the south at 50-55 degrees. they appeared about 10x the size of the stars flying horizontally in single file south  to north. all appeared to be at the same altitude except 2-3 were 3-5 degrees lower. after seeing about  5 i hollered at my sleeping girlfriend to come outside now. she was fortunate to witness the final four before disappearing. i would say there were 12-14 in total. my guesstimate elevation for the ufo's is at 40000 feet plus. at straight west from our view point the lights would turn 90 degrees and go up towards space. as they went up the lights would appear smaller and smaller until they vanished. after the 3rd or 4th light appeared i new i was witnessing an uncommon sight and was fortunate to share it with my girlfriend. the only time i saw anything as bewildering as this was in the summer of 1974 or 1975. three white lights flying like nothing made by man and then darting off into space at lightning speed.
content.summary: I saw 10-15 red white circler lights flying horizontally in single file south to north over te ocean. at a certain point the lights did a 90 degree up turn and became smaller and smaller untill they disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Flying back into phx, i looked out my window and saw an exceptionally bright orange light trailing along next to the aircraft, a few miles or so off the starboard wing. above the clouds, it kept pace with our aircraft, suddenly reversed course on multiple occasions, and also maneuvered up and down at 90 degree angles. i gauged this light against several passing airplanes and realized it was quite a bit larger. the colors began to shift from orange to blue to green to white. as we were nearing final approach, another aircraft buzzed the orb at a very high speed, at which point the craft doused its light and dropped rapidly into the cloud cover.
content.summary: Large pulsing orb trailing flight into phx airport with varied maneuvers. buzzed by additional aircraft. doused lights, plunged into clouds.

content.detailedDescription: While on my back porch in jaco, costa rica on the night of feb. 14th 2015 around 7:30-8:00pm i noticed a color changing light above the mountain behind our house and decided to get my video camera to check it out. this object was very different than other stars etc i have observed in the past. this object pulsated and changed a variety of vibrants colors and in some instances a crisp outline of a geometric shape is visible. at around the 40 minute mark something flies in front of the object and either enters it or flies around it etc. soon after that the object starts to change colors again as well as a wide variety of shapes ranging from an hourglass to the object separating into 2-5 different pieces. the object seemed to descend or dissolve on the other side of the mountain and then was no longer visible to me.
content.summary: I noticed a bright colored twinkling light above the mountains behind our house so i decided to get my video camera to see what it was. i was able to video over an hour of the object changing colors and shapes before fading away.
